text:
Right @borisjohnsonuk now we know who’s boss what are you doing to legalizing cannabis for medical use? Never mind Brexit it’s “oven ready” for January! Time to kill cancer & stop the bullshit!
Who’s with me? #wearegroot #iamgroot #dont4get2check #cancer #cannabis #borisjohnson https://t.co/1eAOLgZpV9
